episodes.title: EP. 86 Bonus Episode!  Kesia's Story pt. 2
episodes.description: What is up everyone! I got a bonus episode here for you all. Former member of the ICOC and previous guest Kesia reached out to me saying that she had more she would like to share specifically, the way we were indoctrinated with no sense of agency in our lives, public shaming of sin, pattern of narcissistic leaders, and how even after the letter went out not much changed in our church. I was glad we were able to bring more issues into the light. If you are a member, were a member, or know someone who was a member of the ICOC and would like to share your story of your life in and out of the church and help us maybe get closer to answering the question "we were in a cult?", and maybe find some healing please contact me via email at clemenzwithaz@gmail.com or you can DM via Instagram at the "Clemenz With a "Z" podcast" Instagram page. As always, thank you for your continued support and if you like what you hear please rate and review! If you don't remember, I'm just a channel, I ain't the source.

episodes.title: EP. 84 We Were In a Cult? TJ's Story
episodes.description: What's up everyone! New episode up in the "We Were In a Cult?" series here on the Clemenz With a "Z" Podcast. I was able to speak with former member TJ about his life in the ICOC. We talked about being a member in college and getting baptized, his life in the church and the struggle it became, his desire to "Do things Right", being a minster in the church, and his eventual leaving the church. It was a great conversation and I could tell it was healing for both of us. If you are a member, were a member, or know someone who was a member of the ICOC and would like to share your story of your life in and out of the church and help us maybe get closer to answering the question "we were in a cult?", and maybe find some healing please contact me via email at clemenzwithaz@gmail.com or you can DM via Instagram at the "Clemenz With a "Z" podcast" Instagram page. episodes.title: EP. 83 We Were In a Cult? Austin Noll's Story
episodes.description: What is up everyone! I have a new episode for you in the "We Were In a Cult" series here on the Clemenz With a "Z" podcast. I was able to sit with former member of the ICOC and author of the book "A Jumble of Crumpled Papers" and podcaster Austin Noll to talk about his life in and out of the ICOC. We talked about growing up in the church and the troubles he faced regarding our church's purity culture as a young man and his subsequent struggle it has been since leaving the church. It was a great conversation! If you would like to learn more about his story, you can check out Austin's book: "A Jumble of Crumpled Papers" here: https://a.co/d/dhXGVI0 You can check out Austin's Podcast "The Crumpled Papers Podcast" on all platforms or here on Spotify: https://open.spotify.com/show/7pc778qvzAxG0kB7vMSDyb?si=595697bc7ce44742 If you are a member, were a member, or know someone who was a member of the ICOC and would like to share your story of your life in and out of the church and help us maybe get closer to answering the question "we were in a cult?", and maybe find some healing please contact me via email at clemenzwithaz@gmail.com or you can DM via Instagram at the "Clemenz With a "Z" podcast" Instagram page. episodes.title: EP. 81 We Were In a Cult? Kesia's Story
episodes.description: What is up everyone! New episode up in the "We Were In a Cult?" series here on the Clemenz with a "Z" podcast. This episode is a big one for me and its because it is my first international episode. I was able to speak with former member of the International Churches of Christ Kesia who was a part of our church in Denmark. Kesia shared her story of growing up in the church and how even though she was a whole ocean away from us here in the stated the church was still the same. I am grateful for her sharing her story with me, to connect you all with more members who are feeling like we are, and to be able to get a more global perspective of the church. She even brought up "The Great Pruning" which was something that I had forgotten about. I hope you all continue to find healing through these stories and are able to feel a little less alone and maybe even a little less crazy. If you are a member, were a member, or know someone who was a member of the ICOC and would like to share your story of your life in and out of the church and help us maybe get closer to answering the question "we were in a cult?", and maybe find some healing please contact me via email at clemenzwithaz@gmail.com or you can DM via Instagram at the "Clemenz With a "Z" podcast" Instagram page. As always, thank you for your continued support and if you like what you hear please rate and review! If you don't remember, I'm just a channel, I ain't the source.

episodes.title: EP. 79 We Were In a Cult? Kristin's Story
episodes.description: What is up everyone! New episode out for the "We Were In a Cult?" series here on the Clemenz With a "Z" Podcast. I was able to speak with former member of the International Churches of Christ Kristin. Our conversation touched on growing up in this church, the strong desire to please parents and authority figures, the shame and guilt that comes with growing up in purity culture, the overall pressure that it was being in this church as a child, and where she is now with all of this. It was a great talk and you all should check it out! If you are a member, were a member, or know someone who was a member of the ICOC and would like to share your story of your life in and out of the church and help us maybe get closer to answering the question "we were in a cult?", and maybe find some healing please contact me via email at clemenzwithaz@gmail.com or you can DM via Instagram at the "Clemenz With a "Z" podcast" Instagram page. episodes.title: EP. 78 We Were In a Cult? Steph's Story
episodes.description: Hello Everyone! New episode alert for the "We Were In a Cult?" series here on the Balanced Male Podcast. I was able to speak with former member of the !COC Steph about her life in the church and leaving the church. She did not stay in the church long after high school so the meat of the talk focused on what is was like being a kid/teen in the church. We touched on dating, purity culture, what it was like moving multiple times in the church, and being in a more affluent area of the church and not being affluent herself. It was a great talk and you all should check it out! If you were a member or know someone who was a member of the ICOC and would like to share your story of your life in and out of the church and help us maybe get closer to answering "we were in a cult?" please contact me via email at balancedmalepcast@gmail.com or you can DM via Instagram at the balanced male podcast Instagram page. episodes.title: EP. 76 We Were In a Cult?  Jon's Story
episodes.description: What's up everyone! I got another episode to share of the "We Were In a Cult?" series here on the Balanced Male Podcast. I was able to speak to a former member Jon. We talked all things ICOC and his life in and out of the church. We discussed what it was like coming out in high school, his struggles being a gay man in the church, race relations and what church was like during COVID times. We also talked about what led to him having to walk away from church to honor himself. If you were a member or know someone who was a member of the ICOC and would like to share your story of your life in and out of the church and help us maybe get closer to answering "we were in a cult?" please contact me via email at balancedmalepcast@gmail.com or you can DM via Instagram at the balanced male podcast Instagram page. episodes.title: EP. 74 We Were In a Cult?  Karen's Story
episodes.description: What's up everyone! I am pumped to share another segment of "We were In a Cult?" here on podcast. This is actually the 10th segment in the series which is awesome to think about. In this episode I spoke with former member of the ICOC Karen. We talked about her life before the church, being introduced to the church as a teen, and what is was like to date someone in the church when it was "off limits" and frowned upon. She also shared more about the dynamics of living in a household of girls and what it was like for her having to exit the church in her teens. If you were a member or know someone who was a member of the ICOC and would like to share your story of your life in and out of the church and help us maybe get closer to answering "we were in a cult?" please contact me via email at balancedmalepcast@gmail.com or you can DM via Instagram at the balanced male podcast Instagram page. episodes.title: EP. 72 We Were In a Cult?  Stephanie's Story
episodes.description: What's up everyone?! Today's episode is another segment of the "We were in a cult?" series here on the Balanced Male Podcast. I was able to speak with a former member of the ICOC Stephanie. We talked about her life in the church and out of the church but more importantly, she shared the abuse she dealt with most of her life by the hands of a member of the church. She currently has a case filed against the church because of it. The conversation was a powerful one and dealt heavily with abuse she endured. I am humbled that she allowed me to share her story and my hope is her story brings healing and justice for all in situations like hers. If you were a member or know someone who was a member of the ICOC and would like to share your story of your life in and out of the church and help us maybe get closer to answering "we were in a cult?" please contact me via email at balancedmalepcast@gmail.com or you can DM via Instagram at the balanced male podcast Instagram page. episodes.title: EP. 71 We Were In a Cult?  Phil's Story
episodes.description: What is up everyone! In this episode of "We Were In a Cult?" I got to talk with former member of the ICOC Phil. We talked about what it was like being met in college, life in the church and the struggles of him trying so hard to fit into this system. We discussed the struggles in this system and how it took him to multiple states before realizing this was not going to be the place for him and all it took to get him to a place of healing and stability. He also shared with me his conversation with ChatGPT about the church and its wild to see what AI thinks of the ICOC. If you were a member or know someone who was a member of the ICOC and would like to share your story of your life in and out of the church and help us maybe get closer to answering "we were in a cult?" please contact me via email at balancedmalepcast@gmail.com or you can DM via Instagram at the balanced male podcast Instagram page. episodes.title: EP. 69 We Were In a Cult?  Erin's Story
episodes.description: What is up everyone! This episode is another segment in the "We Were In a Cult?" series here on the balanced male podcast. This one was a doozy for sure! I was able to speak with former member Erin who is also the founder of the first Instagram meme page dedicated to life in the ICOC: "Didyouhaveyourqt". In our 3 hour conversation we talked about why she started the meme page, growing up with parents that were leaders in the church and the results of them being fired, what it was like for a woman in the church, and what it's like to leave a belief system that you have know your whole life. It was such a great conversation! Check it out and check out her meme page on Instagram. If you were a member or know someone who was a member of the ICOC and would like to share your story of your life in and out of the church and help us maybe get closer to answering "we were in a cult?" please contact me via email at balancedmalepcast@gmail.com or you can DM via Instagram at the balanced male podcast Instagram page. episodes.title: We Were In A Cult?  Keisha’s Story
episodes.description: What's up everyone. Today's episode is the first in what I hope will be many many more conversations about growing up in the ICOC. episodes.title: We Were In a Cult? Jim and I’s stories
episodes.description: Hey guys! In this episode I brought back Jim for us to have a conversation about the church(cult?) we were a part of growing up. We discussed the good, the bad, the weird, and where we are now. I hope you all enjoy!
